title: Katie Price has finally found her daughter's missing hedgehog Peggy
text:
We wonder which clothes pile Peggy made her home (Picture: Katie Price/YouTube)

Katie Price’s family hedgehog has reappeared after two weeks missing in her mucky mansion.

The 41-year-old admitted she lost her daughter’s spiky friend Peggy when she was giving fans a tour of her questionable house last month.

We hope she didn’t find it after pricking her foot.

An insider told The Sun: ‘Peggy is back – Katie always knew she’d find her again.’

The former Page Three model showed off her daughter Princess’ new pet on social media back in February.

We’re not entirely surprised Katie lost the tiny pet considering she just came under fire for her extremely messy house.

With piles of clothing, mounds of rubbish all over the place, it would be easy for a tiny ball of spikes to disappear.

My name is Katie and I will be giving you a tour around Mucky Mansion (Picture: YouTube / Katie Price)

Over here you’ll see priceless Banksy murals (Picture: YouTube / Katie Price)

Katie Price attempted to halt those persistent mucky mansion claims, once and for all, a few days ago.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Taking to her YouTube channel, the star gave fans a warts-and-all glimpse into her £2 million West Sussex home.

In the tour, the model showed off countless rooms, filled to the brim with piles and piles of clothes on every surface.

If we zoom in close enough in the video, we can probably see Peggy hiding somewhere in the countless rooms.

Speaking to viewers, she admitted that she was attempting to clear her home out and offload her belongings on eBay – which might take her longer than she first thought.

However, she did little to dispel the rumours as she spoke to the camera against a white wall, covered in colourful drawings and crayon squiggles.

And over here, a five-star family pool (Picture: YouTube / Katie Price)

And that concludes the tour of Mucky Mansion (Picture: Katie Price/YouTube)

Katie also showed off her love of underwear and tights, before confessing she’s quite boring in the bedroom department, contrary to popular belief.

Flaunting her extensive collection of suspenders, Peter Andre’s ex asked: ‘Would you think I’m boring in bed looking at all this?

‘I’m so b****y boring. I just love stockings and suspenders. I love it.’

Standing in the middle of one room, packed full of clothes and undies, she told two helpers: ‘It’s exhausting to know where to start.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘This gives me a headache, to be honest.’

Metro.co.uk have contacted reps for comment.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Katie Price has found her daughter Princess' missing hedgehog Peggy two weeks after it went missing in her mucky mansion.
